Title: Maggots in your Eyes
Description:
<Albert is no longer alive. All that remains is his head, still full of maggots.

Taking him back to the Pathfinders seems like the right thing to do.>
ObjectivesText: Take Albert's head to the Pathfinders in Faerin's Advance.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Take Albert's head to the Pathfinders in Faerin's Advance.
RewardText:
This eyeless, mostly eaten, maggot-infested head is...

Albert! Oh no, what happened?!

We didn't know where his team had gone, just that they'd taken a mission near the city.  I can't imagine the trauma he endured, or what you had to do to bring his remains to us. We'll take it from here. Thank you for bringing him back.

And I hope the nightmares that could come from this don't linger for you, friend.
